Share.origin: [a joint tortfeasor is liable for her of the damages]

1.definition: a portion belonging to, due to, or due from an individual [a joint tortfeasor is liable for her of the damages]the part allotted or belonging to one of a number owning together any property or interest [the of a joint tenant] [his passed to his widow]

2 a.definition: any of the equal interests into which ownership of something (as a fund) is dividedany of the equal interests or rights into which the entire capital stock of a corporation is divided

sub_terms.b: a certificate representing such a share
